an1.616:1.1: “Amatam te, bhikkhave, na paribhunjanti ye kayagatasatim na paribhunjanti.
an1.616:1.2: Amatam te, bhikkhave, paribhunjanti ye kayagatasatim paribhunjanti”ti.
an1.617:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, aparibhuttam yesam kayagatasati aparibhutta.
an1.617:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, paribhuttam yesam kayagatasati paribhutta”ti.
an1.618:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, parihinam yesam kayagatasati parihina.
an1.618:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, aparihinam yesam kayagatasati aparihina”ti.
an1.619:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, viraddham yesam kayagatasati viraddha.
an1.619:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, araddham yesam kayagatasati araddha”ti.
an1.620:1.1: “Amatam te, bhikkhave, pamadimsu ye kayagatasatim pamadimsu.
an1.620:1.2: Amatam te, bhikkhave, na pamadimsu ye kayagatasatim na pamadimsu”.
an1.621:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, pamuttham yesam kayagatasati pamuttha.
an1.621:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, appamuttham yesam kayagatasati appamuttha”ti.
an1.622:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, anasevitam yesam kayagatasati anasevita.
an1.622:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, asevitam yesam kayagatasati asevita”ti.
an1.623:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, abhavitam yesam kayagatasati abhavita.
an1.623:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, bhavitam yesam kayagatasati bhavita”ti.
an1.624:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, abahulikatam yesam kayagatasati abahulikata.
an1.624:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, bahulikatam yesam kayagatasati bahulikata”ti.
an1.625:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, anabhinnatam yesam kayagatasati anabhinnata.
an1.625:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, abhinnatam yesam kayagatasati abhinnata”ti.
an1.626:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, aparinnatam yesam kayagatasati aparinnata.
an1.626:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, parinnatam yesam kayagatasati parinnata”ti.
an1.627:1.1: “Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, asacchikatam yesam kayagatasati asacchikata.
an1.627:1.2: Amatam tesam, bhikkhave, sacchikatam yesam kayagatasati sacchikata”ti.
an1.627:2.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
